-  withDashSeparatorInDate 

Type Property# withDashSeparatorInDate

iOS 10.0+iPadOS 10.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.12+tvOS 10.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 3.0+

```
static var withDashSeparatorInDate: ISO8601DateFormatter.Options { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/ISO8601DateFormatter/Options/withDashSeparatorInDate#Discussion)

The date representation uses the dash separator (`-`) in the date.
